original_title: Sri Lanka coconut auction prices down 8-pct in new year
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s coconut prices fell 7.6 percent to 70.067 rupees for 1,000 nuts at the first auction in 2024,  down from 75,829 in December, data from the Coconut Development Authority shows.
The highest auction price was 78,600 rupees for 1,000 nuts while the lowest auction price was 60,000 rupees, at an auction on January 04.
A total of 789,094 coconuts were offered and 704,931 coconuts were sold.
Farmgate prices in Kurunegala were estimated at 68,000 to 70,000 rupees.
Coconut shells were listed at 26,000 to 28,000 rupees a tonne. (Colombo/Jan06/2023)
